name: SpaceRace (Dax)
description:
RACE THROUGH SPACE!!! WITH NO BREAKS use your phone to steer yourself through the debris run into/absorb the CYBER-WEBS to slow down for better control!!!!

This Game was made and intended to be played on an android phone using the gyro to steer the space-ship, Please download the apk for the best exp!!!

An adapted version for WEB-GL was also made using A - D  to steer!!!!

LootLocker leaderboards are updated on the main menu so dont forget to put your Initals
